name: Notion for Plumbers: Online Course

Dive deep into database relations, integrations, and formulas, all while enhancing your workflow and productivity. Get ready to transform your daily operations with Not
features: 1. Laying the Foundation: Notion Basics for Plumbers; 2. Building Powerful Databases: Relations and Filters; 3. Formulas Unleashed: Automating Your Workflow; 4.
